member.name: T:Interfaces.IMyAnimeHubDBManagerAdapter
member.summary: The interface of an adapter class used by a client that want to work only with strings

member.name: M:Interfaces.IMyAnimeHubDBManagerAdapter.LoginOrRegister(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Method that tries to regiter or log in the user. It may throw exceptions if the request is invalid.
member.param: String that will be assigned with the result
member.returns: The action that the user performed

member.name: M:Interfaces.IMyAnimeHubDBManagerAdapter.ProcessRequest(System.String,System.String@)
member.param: String that will be assigned with the result
member.returns: True if the request was valid, false otherwise
